summary: Phase 7 passes all quality gates. Session restore, timeout, error boundaries, and orphan cleanup are well-structured. All checks passed on first try.

maxFileLines.details: All files under 300 lines (max: useBootstrap.ts at 103)

maxFunctionLines.details: All functions under 50 lines. Largest: restoreSessions ~20 lines

dependencyDirection.details: hooks → features → core. No circular imports.

resultTypes.details: neverthrow Result types used consistently in api calls and bootstrap

cleanupListeners.details: useBootstrap uses cancelled flag, useAgentTimeout clears interval, cleanup_on_exit handles sidecar and PTY

zustandSelectors.details: All Zustand usage via selectors or getState()

errorBoundaryException.details: Class-based ErrorBoundary properly documented as the one exception to no-classes rule

strengths: All 3 build checks passed on first attempt — zero errors
Proper cancellation pattern in useBootstrap (cancelled flag)
Clean separation: findTimedOutSessionIds is pure, abortTimedOutSession handles side effects
cleanup_on_exit handles both sidecar and PTY shutdown
Error boundary fallback UI is polished with retry button

issues.description: useAgentTimeout checks session.createdAt for timeout, but a session that sends follow-ups should probably track last activity time. Acceptable for MVP.
